name: 打怪! Beat the Mons!
description:
You have unknowingly fallen into the world of geometry, sadly the shapes do not seem to welcome you...

Hold your weapon and fight for your survival against endless waves of geometrical monsters!
Grab powerups to enhance your strength!
And don't forget you can cease fire sometimes!
Even though there's not chance to avoid the eventual death,
You have fought for your life!
